place.name: BASILDON
place.gazetteerText: BASILDON, a chapelry in Laindon parish, Essex; 2 miles NNW of Pitsea r. station, and 4 SE of Billericay. Post Town, Laindon, under Billericay. Acres, 1,627. Real property, £1,927. Pop., 180. Houses, 25. The living is annexed to Laindon rectory in the diocese of Rochester. (In 1870-72, John Marius Wilson's Imperial Gazetteer of England and Wales)
